meta.title: From TRUE to COLORS
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: We're celebrating Pride Month with Raddles inspired by LGBTQ+ anthems. Today we honor "True Colors" written by Tom Kelly and Billy Steinberg, and made famous by Cyndi Lauper from her 1986 album of the same name.
